query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Una medesma lingua pria mi morse, 2 sì che mi tinse l’una e l’altra guancia, 3 e poi la medicina mi riporse;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 4 hemma a glewas vy ow tos an lans 5 Akilles ha’y das a veu an keth, 6 kyns an keth dhe vos marow ha lemmyn medhegin.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 tanto ch’avrebbe ogne tuon fatto fioco, 14 che, contra sé la sua via seguitando, 15 dirizzò li occhi miei tutti ad un loco.

query.result: 13 marow uhel henna a veu pub ton ow tos tew, 14 ow hemma, ow sewya y hons orth y honan, 15 a leveris vyth golwg oll dhe unn le.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 16 Wosa an golledh dolorus, pythegows 17 Karl an Meur a gollas an jesta sans, 18 Rolant na sonnas y gern marow uhel.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 Poco portäi in là volta la testa, 20 che me parve veder molte alte torri; 21 ond’ io: «Maestro, dì, che terra è questa?».
query.error: **English:** 19 I had turned my head that way for a short while, 20 when it seemed to me that I saw many high towers; 21 whereupon I said: “Master, tell me, what land is this?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 22 Hag hemma dhe’n keth: “Rag henna ty a dremena 23 dre’n tewlder pub pell, 24 yw ow tos wosa henna ty a wraga yn dy golwg.”

query.prompt:
